type.name: org.gradle.api.resources.ResourceHandler
type.description: Provides access to resource-specific utility methods, for example factory methods that create various resources.

method.name: gzip
method.description:
Creates resource that points to a gzip compressed file at the given path. The path is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:path The path evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).

method.name: bzip2
method.description:
Creates resource that points to a bzip2 compressed file at the given path. The path is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:path The path evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).

method.name: getText
method.description:
Returns a factory for creating TextResources from various sources such as strings, files, and archive entries. @since 2.2

returns:a factory for creating TextResources

property.name: text
property.description:
Returns a factory for creating TextResources from various sources such as strings, files, and archive entries. @since 2.2

returns:a factory for creating TextResources
